name: erythronium
content:
Add to word list

a kind of small spring plant that has white, yellow, pink, or purple flowers with curved petals: Plant spring-flowering bulbs such as erythronium to provide interest early in the year. Erythroniums should be kept in just-damp compost until planting out. Synonym
trout lily
More examplesFewer examplesYou need to be an early spring visitor to see the dogstooth violet, Erythronium dens-canis, in flower.Erythroniums wither quickly and lose their power of recovery if allowed to dry out.Winter foliage plants are interplanted with interesting woodlanders such as erythronium.
